snippet: A security firm revealed that the Heartbleed flaw was used last week to break into the network of an undisclosed company with sophisticated attack detection systems.
lead_paragraph: A security firm revealed that the Heartbleed flaw was used last week to break into the network of an undisclosed company with sophisticated attack detection systems.

headline.main: Hackers Use Heartbleed to Hit ‘Major Corporation’
headline.print_headline: Hackers Use Heartbleed to Hit ‘Major Corporation’
